Package net.proteusframework.core.metric

Measurement classes.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AutoMetric
    A metric that represents an "auto" value.
    DeviceMetric
    A DeviceMetric instance is used to realize Metric objects.
    Dimension
    The Dimension class is used to specify the width and height of something, normally a component or part thereof.
    DimensionEditor
    Editor for Dimension.
    DpiDeviceMetric
    The DpiDeviceMetric can handle most conversions using a DPI (Dots Per Inch) value.
    EmMetric
    Metric for the Em unit.
    Metric
    A Metric instance represents a single dimension measurement.
    MetricEditor
    Editor for Metric.
    MilliMetric
    The MilliMetric represents a Metric measured in millimeters.
    MonitorDeviceMetric
    The MonitorDeviceMetric models a device whose dimensions are defined by pixels.
    PercentMetric
    A PercentMetric instance defines the value of the Metric as a percentage.
    PixelMetric
    A PixelMetric instance defines the value of the Metric as a number of pixels.
    Point
    The Point class is used to specify the position of something.
    PointMetric
    A PointMetric instance defines the value of the Metric as a number of Points.
    UnknownMetric
    The UnknownMetric class is used to represent a metric whose units are unknown.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    MetricUnit
    Defines the metric units

Package net.proteusframework.core.metric Description

Measurement classes.
